titles.title: Office of the Homeowner Advocate Act of 2010

To establish in the Department of the Treasury the Office of the Homeowner Advocate to assist homeowners, housing counselors, and housing lawyers in resolving problems with the Home Affordable Modification Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Office of the Homeowner Advocate Act of 2010 - Establishes in the Department of the Treasury the Office of the Homeowner Advocate to assist homeowners, housing counselors, and housing lawyers in resolving problems with the Home Affordable Modification Program of the Making Home Affordable initiative of the Secretary of the Treasury, authorized under the Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008.
